channel.title: InnovativeX-614 || Legacy614 Has Returned!
channel.description:
Hello! Welcome to InnovativeX.
[b]---------------------------------------------------[/b]
Click Here to Play Instantly! | [url=http://innovativex.org/forums/forum.php]Click Here to Browse our Forums![/url]
[u][b]Overview:[/b][/u] InnovativeX 614 is a server created after the shutdown of the popular and successful server, Legacy 614. It is a PK and Spawn based server, where the player simply logs in, sets his levels, spawns his items and PKs! Legacy 614 was successful for 3 consecutive years, and we hope to achieve the same long and successful journey. This won't happen without you!
[u][b]Token System:[/b][/u] Our server works with a unique token system, that allows you to buy several un-spawnable items. To obtain these tokens, you must achieve a kill in either a safe or dangerous zone. Every zone has a different token granting system; where you will receive more tokens if you kill an opponent in a dangerous zone. You can also receive double the amount of tokens if you purchase our unique ring; the Ring of 2x Tokens.
[u][b]Below is a list of items you can buy with only the tokens:[/b][/u]
[ul][li][b][i]Every Chaotic Item![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Dragon Claws![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Armadyl Godsword![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]PvP Armour + Weapons![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Partyhats + H'ween masks![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Fire Capes![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Barrows Gloves![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Fighter Torso + Fighter Helm![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Ring of Vigour![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Arcane Stream Necklace![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Korasi's Sword![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Much more![/i][/b][/li][/ul]
[u][b]Level System:[/b][/u] Players of InnovativeX have completely control of their levels. Using the command ::master, you can max out all of your stats! Or, if you want to level a certain level, you can use the command ::setlevel x y (where X is the skill ID, and Y is the desired level)!
[u][b]Unique PvP Packages:[/b][/u] To enhance gameplay and make PKing instant, we have a variety of pre-made packages that gives you items and sets your levels for you! An example of these packages is the ::hybrid package, where you are a maxed level 138 with maxed out hybrid gear!
[u][b]Features:[/b][/u] If you are still not convinced, here is a list of all of our features:
[ul][li][b][i]Overload, Recover Special, Super Prayer, and Extreme Potions![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Vesta, Statius, Zuriel, and Morrigan![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Great PKing Spots (Easts, Wests, 52s, Volcano, Edgeville, Falador PvP, and more)![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Curses![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Dicing![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Fully working Korasi's Sword![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Perfect Hybridding + Switching![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Active + great community![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Active and amazing staff![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Spawn AND Economy![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]24/7 Uptime![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]Instant Donation System with many benefits![/i][/b][/li] [li][b][i]vBulletin forums![/i][/b][/li][/ul]
[u][b]Images:[/b][/u]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5b9Fnin.png[/img]

item.title: InnovativeX-614 || Legacy614 Has Returned!
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Hurries I Am Hurries
item.description:
@I_Am_Hurries wrote:

Hello! Welcome to InnovativeX.

---------------------------------------------------

Click Here to Play Instantly! | Click Here to Browse our Forums!

Overview: InnovativeX 614 is a server created after the shutdown of the popular and successful server, Legacy 614. It is a PK and Spawn based server, where the player simply logs in, sets his levels, spawns his items and PKs! Legacy 614 was successful for 3 consecutive years, and we hope to achieve the same long and successful journey. This won’t happen without you!

Token System: Our server works with a unique token system, that allows you to buy several un-spawnable items. To obtain these tokens, you must achieve a kill in either a safe or dangerous zone. Every zone has a different token granting system; where you will receive more tokens if you kill an opponent in a dangerous zone. You can also receive double the amount of tokens if you purchase our unique ring; the Ring of 2x Tokens.

Below is a list of items you can buy with only the tokens:

[ul][li]Every Chaotic Item![/li]
[li]Dragon Claws![/li]
[li]Armadyl Godsword![/li]
[li]PvP Armour + Weapons![/li]
[li]Partyhats + H’ween masks![/li]
[li]Fire Capes![/li]
[li]Barrows Gloves![/li]
[li]Fighter Torso + Fighter Helm![/li]
[li]Ring of Vigour![/li]
[li]Arcane Stream Necklace![/li]
[li]Korasi’s Sword![/li]
[li]Much more![/li][/ul]

Level System: Players of InnovativeX have completely control of their levels. Using the command ::master, you can max out all of your stats! Or, if you want to level a certain level, you can use the command ::setlevel x y (where X is the skill ID, and Y is the desired level)!

Unique PvP Packages: To enhance gameplay and make PKing instant, we have a variety of pre-made packages that gives you items and sets your levels for you! An example of these packages is the ::hybrid package, where you are a maxed level 138 with maxed out hybrid gear!

Features: If you are still not convinced, here is a list of all of our features:

[ul][li]Overload, Recover Special, Super Prayer, and Extreme Potions![/li]
[li]Vesta, Statius, Zuriel, and Morrigan![/li]
[li]Great PKing Spots (Easts, Wests, 52s, Volcano, Edgeville, Falador PvP, and more)![/li]
[li]Curses![/li]
[li]Dicing![/li]
[li]Fully working Korasi’s Sword![/li]
[li]Perfect Hybridding + Switching![/li]
[li]Active + great community![/li]
[li]Active and amazing staff![/li]
[li]Spawn AND Economy![/li]
[li]24/7 Uptime![/li]
[li]Instant Donation System with many benefits![/li]
[li]vBulletin forums![/li][/ul]

Images:

5b9Fnin.png939×129
